ActCriminal Code
SubjectOrder Declaring an Amnesty Period (2018)
PrecisOrder Declaring an AMNESTY PERIOD (2018) in order to extend the Amnesty Order, until February 28, 2021, in order to encourage compliance with the licensing provisions of the Firearms Act and the Criminal Code prior to its expiration.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0046 Publication Date: 2018-04-04
